name: Growth of Redemtion
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

MOVE: WASD

SUMMON: SPACE -  when your plant is summon, you now have control of the plant, he will move with the mouse cursor to aim

TO SHOOT WHEN CONTROLLING SUMMON: LEFT CLICK MOUSE

THE SUMMON WILL ONLY LAST 5 SECONDS, AFTERWARDS YOU CAN SUMMON AGAIN ( YOU CAN ONLY SUMMON 1 AT A TIME)

I hope you enjoy my game, I put a lot of effort into it, I know its a short game, but see this as a demo. i do wish to expand this game and add tons of thing on here. any feedback or recommendation as to what you would like to see in the game is welcomed

Music by Marllon Silva (xdeviruchi)
